description: This PHP source file generates a web-based user interface for managing QoS settings on a network device, including enabling/disabling WMM and MoCA QoS features, with associated JavaScript for interactivity and AJAX calls for saving settings.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the user interface elements based on current QoS settings.

methods.name: saveQoS
methods.description: Sends updated QoS settings to the server via AJAX POST request.
